roga niwarana madhyasthana nawathan nomilaye ho 70%ka mila sahanayak sahithawa labaduni. 1976-1980 kalaya thuladi miliyana 260kata wadi pirisak wisin mema niwadu nikethana, saukhyagara ha wiwekagara pahasukam laba thibuni. 1980 wana wita sowiyat deshaya thula jathyanthara mattame ranga shala 600k, kauthukagara 1400k, pusthakala 350,000k winoda udyana 2000kata wadi gananak idikara thibuni.

mema yuda abhyasawaladi athi nawina pruthiwi sanniwedana krama saha bhumi sthana soya ganima sadaha wishesha thakshana kramada yodaganna ladi.‚Äòbottu angana wetha sidukarana aakramana‚Äô, itha wadagath ilakka labaganima‚Äô, sathuru thorathuru wimarshanaya‚Äô, ‚Äòsathuru ilakka thorathuru aawekshanaya‚Äô, ‚Äòguwanin pamina goda basa karana kriyanwitha‚Äô, ‚Äòmuhudin pamina sidukarana kriyanwitha‚Äô, ‚Äòjalayen pamina godabimata langawima‚Äô, ‚Äòsathuru gaman marga soya sidukarana meheyuma‚Äô, ‚Äòsathurage shakthimath sthana wetha sidukarana wishesha prahara,, ‚Äòraka sita paharadim‚Äô, ‚Äòwimarshana mura sanchara‚Äô, ‚Äòprathi thrastha kriya saha prana apakaruwan mudaganima‚Äô wani meheyum ha kriyanwitha mewara yuda abhyasayata athulathwinikriyanwitha salasum kirima, sudanamwima, thorathuru wishleshanaya, ekamuthubhawaya, nayakathwaya, hasirawima, yudhopayan, shilpiya krama saha nisi kriyapiliweth magin labadenu labana simawanwalata yatathwa wishesha kriyanwitha kriyathmaka kirima, yuda hamuda usas niladharinge purna adhikshanaya yatathe sidukerini.samastha diyakawa meheyumehi uparima awasthawa lesa handinwiya haki mema awasana meheyum sandaha shri lanka guwan hamudawa ha nawika hamudawa mana lesa sambandhikaranaya wima mehidi kapi penuni.mema yuda abhyasayanhi upakalpithaya wuye sathuru hamudawa rathu hamudawa lesatath nil hamudawa owunta erehiwa satan wadina hamudawa lesatathya.ee anuwa kamando rejimenthuwa(nil hamudawa) pasugiya (24) sawasa madakalapuwa punnakudahidi upa kalpitha rathu hamudawe awasan sathuru kandawura winasha kirime meheyuma diyath kaleyaguwan hamuda sahayen goda bata nil hamudawo rathu hamuda bala kandawura wataluwe eda manushiya meheyumedi sathurata nodanena lesa sathurata lanwu yudha kriyanwithayan walata nodeweni lesini.sathuru hamudawe marmasthana winasha kirima pramukha wagakima karatagath komando sebalun yuhusuluwa siya kriyanwithaya diyath kale nagenahira palathe erawur sita kilomitar 3 k pamana obben wu pradeshayedi ya.komando sebalun rathu hamudawe marmasthanayata athulu wana awasthawe rathu hamudawa da prathi prahara ella kale ya.ema prahara nothaka kandawura thulata komando sebalun athulu wanawita owunge sahayata nawuka sebalu wega praharaka yathra aadharayen paminini.ee wanawita nawika hamudawe kuda yathra balaganaye thawath yathra da ee aasannaye praharayata sudanaminikrama kramayen rathu hamuda kandawurata athulu wu komando sebalu ehi siti siyalu ma sathuru hamuda winasha kirimata samath wuha.komando sebalun rathu hamuda kandawuru bhumiyen pitathata paminenawath samagama shri lanka guwan hamudawe kafir saha ef sewan yana kandawurata guwanin prahara ella kale athitha satan athdakim yali sihi ganwamini.eda yuda gatum pawathi samaye me pradesha sabawatama samanya janathawa mara damamin ape wirodara sebalunge jiwitha bili gath el.ti.ti thrasthrawadinge balakotu pawathi pradeshayanya.

amathiwarayage putha wisin niyojya polispathiwarayage puthata paharadime siddhiya ee asala siti ayeku jangama durakathanayen kamaragatha kara athi bawata polisiyata thorathuru labi athi athara ema pudgalaya methek idiripath wi nathayi polisiya kiyayi.

akt 16 gana oba danna karuna sampurna musawak bawa kanagatuwen unath kiyanna kamathiyi.deshiya sisun samath wimata lakunu 50k labagatha yuthuyi.wides sisun sandahada pawathiye me lakunu 50 simawama thamayi.ee wagema mathak karanna kamathiyi deshiya ha wideshiya sisun yana degollantama prashna laba ganne ekama bahuwarana prashna mulashrayakin bawa.namuth wides sisun wibhagaya asiruyayi pawasa owunge samathwime kadaima 45 dakwa pahatha helana lesata illa sita thibenawa.akt 16 gana obage prakashayata uththara dima pama une ma ee pilibandawa soya balu nisa bawu da mehidi sandahan karanu kamaththemi.

aparikshakari lesa riya padawa manushya ghathanayak sidukale yayi adhikaranaya hamuwe warada piligath riyadurekuta kolambaa mahadhikarana winisuru pi‡∑ärathi padman surasena mahatha wisin rupiyal laksha thunaka dada mudalak eeye (08) niyama wiya.barapathala wada sahitha awurudu dekaka sira danduwamakda withthikaruta niyama wu athara danduwama awurudu dahayakata ath hitawini.mese danduwam labuwe motar ratha kuliyata labadena aayathanayaka riyadureku¬™ wu hathalis hawiridi pi. em. chaminda suresh yana ayayi.2007 janawari 14 da thalawathugodadi montiro wargaye jip rathayak aparikshakariwa, adhika wegayen nisi ayurin sodisimath nowi padawamin kathriaarachchige dewid yana ayage maranaya sidukarana ladayi withthikaruta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya adhichodana idiripath kara thibini.mema anathuren miyagos aththe ema pradeshaye supiri niwasa sankirnayaka murakaruweku lesa sewaya kala hatapas wiyathi pudgalayeki.withthikaruta niyama wu dada mudala nogewwoth barawada sahitha awurudu dekaka siri danduwamak da niyama wu athara dada mudala gewima sandaha kal labini.
